pageContent: Objective: To evaluate the associations of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) use with risk of erectile dysfunction (ED), considering the indications for NSAID use.

metaData.source:
Sexual problems in men with prostate cancer in comparison with men with benign prostatic hyperplasia and men from the general population
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/11822505/
